entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 14 April 2023
